title: WTT Broadleaf or Lajoie  for rare backs
author: asphaltman

posts.post_title: WTT Broadleaf or Lajoie  for rare backs
posts.post_content:
Open to trading either one of these for rare backs.  Looking for lower grade (yes lower than the Broadleaf,ie 1 or 1.5, but no paperloss, and numerical grade only...).  You may have a lower grade Broadleaf and want to trade up and have a low grade CB or Hindu to throw in, etc...same with the Lajoie...willing to listen for low grade rare backs.  

[url=https://ibb.co/Y2WXxt4][img]https://i.ibb.co/qBnCvRL/1910-T206-Clancy-Broadleaf-F.jpg[/img][/url][url=https://ibb.co/d2x68tL][img]https://i.ibb.co/QNtnykC/1910-T206-Clancy-Broadleaf-B.jpg[/img][/url]
[url=https://ibb.co/mXcKR20][img]https://i.ibb.co/QCKVJTk/1910-T206-Lajoie-SV350-F.jpg[/img][/url][url=https://ibb.co/rvXm41b][img]https://i.ibb.co/wY2RMxJ/1910-T206-Lajoie-SV350-B.jpg[/img][/url]
